posts.post_title: FS/FT1911 T205 Gold Border Rube Marquard PSA EX 5-Reduced
posts.post_content:
Last comp was a sale at over $1,100 in the spring at REA for a 4.5 while a PSA 6 sold for $2400 in spring 2021

Asking $1350 delivered via F&F 

Will also consider a PSA 5 or better HOF T206 card +/- cash

Thanks
Wayne
